name: Space landing
description:
Due to an accident, a space being finds himself on planet earth in search of the ship's core. Aestris will therefore have to face various dangers in order to recover the core of the ship, and return home.
The game is retro pixel art style, single player. It's a top-down adventure with puzzles and brain teasers.
in the game you will play an alien who will have to overcome different puzzles, interact with humans.
Space Landing is an exploratory topdown game.
